metadata.title: CVE-2022-37706 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: enlightenment_sys in Enlightenment before 0.25.4 allows local users to gainprivileges because it is setuid root, and the system library functionmishandles pathnames that begin with a /dev/.. substring.

criterions.comment: e17: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
